name: cf-oidc-proxy
description: Connect GitHub Actions OIDC with Cloudflare by using CF-OIDC-Proxy

scripts.build: env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64  go build  -o bin/cf-oidc-proxy .
scripts.build:start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sls deploy --stage prod

author: Johannes Waigel <johannes@waigel.com>
